textAfterTable: Game Overview The Amazing Spider-Man is a third-person open world action/adventure video game, a tie-in to the film of the same name featuring the Marvel Comics superhero, Spider-Man. It was developed by Beenox, developer of Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions and Spider-Man: Edge of Time and published by Activision. The game was written and scripted by Seamus Kevin Fahey, of Battlestar Galactica fame and serves as an epilogue to The Amazing Spider-Man film.
